translation.Desenvolvedor Front-end fascinado por tr: Front-end developer fascinated by transforming ideas into digital presence.
translation.Especializado em React e Next.js, combin: Specialized in React and Next.js, I combine creativity and technical knowledge to create functional and innovative applications.
translation.Como profissional, busco sempre construi: As a professional, I always seek to build clean and reusable codes, resulting in scalable and easy-to-maintain projects.
translation.Website produzido para uma empresa impor: Website produced for a sugar importing and exporting company. With a modern and functional design, with languages in Portuguese, English and Spanish, built in React with Typescript and Tailwind.
translation.Desenvolvimento de um e-commerce de joia: Development of a jewelry e-commerce. With the intention of creating an online presence for an entrepreneur, built mainly using React.js with Javascript and CSS.
